nome: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken: Kanwa - Veldora Nikki (Dublado)

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken: Kanwa - Veldora Nikki
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Tales - Veldora's Journal
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Ifrit, who has been trapped in Rimuru due to the latter's Predator skill, recaps events of the season while in a discussion with Veldora as they play Shogi.

(Source: Wikipedia)
